tasks.start: deno fmt && deno lint && deno check --unstable-sloppy-imports src/main.ts && deno run --unstable-sloppy-imports --allow-net --allow-run --allow-read --allow-write --allow-ffi --allow-env src/main.ts
tasks.typecheck: deno check --unstable-sloppy-imports src/main.ts && deno check --unstable-sloppy-imports src/chapters/chapter-processor.ts
tasks.test:deno: deno fmt && deno lint && deno check --unstable-sloppy-imports src/main.ts && deno test --unstable-sloppy-imports -A src/**/*.spec.ts
tasks.test:deno:coverage: deno fmt && deno lint && deno check --unstable-sloppy-imports src/main.ts && rm -rf coverage && deno test --unstable-sloppy-imports -A --coverage=coverage src/**/*.spec.ts && deno coverage coverage --lcov > coverage/lcov-deno.info
